Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: HSBC Visa Platinum Credit Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Up to 2% cash rebate on dining in Singapore. Kids play, dine and stay for free every day at Resorts World Sentosa.
Up to 5% cashback on all Grocery, Petrol (Caltex, Shell), and on Recurring Payment (eg: Internet/ Cable TV/ Mobile).
Earn 1 reward point for every S$1 spend.

Details.Name: sc_promotion_details
Details.Feature: S$20 Cash Rebate

Details.Name: sc_promotion_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Select Samsonite RED Robo 65cm Luggage as the sign up gift. 2. Sign up and submit supporting documents online.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: 2 options:
1. Samsonite RED Robo 65cm Luggage worth S$335 OR
2. RedMart grocery voucher worth S$80

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Samsonite RED Robo 65cm Luggage (worth S$335): Charge a minimum of S$600 within the first month of card issuance.
2. S$80 RedMart grocery voucher: Charge a minimum of S$60 within the first month of card issuance.
3. Credit card applications must be submitted between 1 Feb 2016 - 31 March 2016, and receive application approval by 15 April 2016.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Rebates will be subject to a maximum cap of S$120 per account per Quarter.
Min spending of S$800/month for 3 consecutive months in a quarter to be eligible for 5% groceries, 5% petrol, 2% dining cashback.
Accumulate spending of S$400 monthly for all 3 months in a quarter to receive 3% cashback on groceries, Petrol (Caltex, Shell) & 1% dining cashback in Singapore.

Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: 5% cash rebate on Recurring Mobile/Cable TV/Internet Bill Payment (with min. $400 spend/month in a quarter)
5% or 3% cash rebates on all grocery spend (with min. $800 or $400 spend/month in a quarter)
5% or 3% cash rebates at all Shell and Caltex stations (with min. $800 or $400 spend/month in a quarter)
2% or 1% cash rebates on dining (with min. $800 or $400 spend/month in a quarter) Cash rebates capped at S$60 per Account per Quarter

Details.Name: sc_dining_details
Details.Feature: $1 = 1 Rewards point
1% cash rebates on all dining spend with min. S$400 spend/month for all 3 months in a calendar quarter
2% cash rebates on all dining spend with min. S$800 spend/month for all 3 months in a calendar quarter

Details.Name: sc_entertainment_details
Details.Feature: Weekdays Movie Card at $70 for 10 weekday movie ticket (save up to $15)
All Days Movie Card at $85 for 10 any day tickets (save up to $30)

Details.Name: sc_grocery_details
Details.Feature: 3% cash rebates on all grocery spend with min. S$400 spend/month for all 3 months in a calendar quarter
5% cash rebates on all grocery spend with min. S$800 spend/month for all 3 months in a calendar quarter

Details.Name: sc_petrol_details
Details.Feature: Up to 20.2% in savings at Shell and Caltex stations
16% instant discount Caltex stations (5% site discount + 9% HSBC card discount + 2% outdoor fuel payment discount* + 3% or 5% cash rebate)
14% instant discount at Shell stations (5% site discount + 5% shell escape discount + 4% HSBC card discount)
3% or 5% in cash rebates (min. spend $400 or $800/month respectively for all 3 months)
*Outdoor Fuel Payment discount valid till 30 April

Details.Name: sc_rewards_details
Details.Feature: $1 = 1 Rewards point
Earn HSBC Rewards points when you pay your taxes with your credit card
